channel.title: 317 PI, Slayer Points/Donator Points using coin
channel.description: Hey, I need help with my slayer points and donator points, they are set to 3b so if it doesnt' ask for the points, the players can't buy them. But...how do I make them buy for donator points and slayer points? I couldn't post my post here, because of the max number imput or whatever, so here's the link to my post for it on rune-server, please help? http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/help/559998-317-pi-slayer-points-donator-points-using-coin.html

item.title: 317 PI, Slayer Points/Donator Points using coin
item.dc:creator: @tdmister45 tdmister45
item.description:
@tdmister45 wrote:

Hey, I need help with my slayer points and donator points, they are set to 3b so if it doesnt’ ask for the points, the players can’t buy them. But…how do I make them buy for donator points and slayer points? I couldn’t post my post here, because of the max number imput or whatever, so here’s the link to my post for it on rune-server, please help?
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/help/559998-317-pi-slayer-points-donator-points-using-coin.html

Read full topic
